mapper.sql: DMN_ID, DMN_LNM, DMN_PNM, RQST_NO, RQST_SNO, OBJ_DESCN, OBJ_VERS, REG_TYP_CD, FRS_RQST_DTM, FRS_RQST_USER_ID, RQST_DTM, RQST_USER_ID, APRV_DTM, APRV_USER_ID, ASIS_DIT, ASIS_SYSTEM_NM, ASIS_GROUP_NM, ASIS_PART_NM, ASIS_BIZ_NM, ASIS_BIZ_CD, ASIS_DB_NM, ASIS_TBL_NM, ASIS_COL_ID, ASIS_COL_NM, CODE_NM, DFD_COL_NM, DFD_COL_VALUE, CODE_VALUE, CODE_DISP_NUM, APP_TEAM_NM, APP_CHRG_NM, TSF_TEAM_NM, TSF_CHRG_NM, LAST_CHG_DT, ADD_NOTE1, ADD_NOTE2, ADD_NOTE3, ADD_NOTE4, APP_SI_NM
mapper.select:
SELECT A.* FROM WAM_ASIS_DMN_CD_VAL A
AND DMN_ID LIKE '%'||#{dmnId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}||'%'
AND DMN_LNM LIKE '%'||#{dmnLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}||'%'
AND DMN_PNM LIKE '%'||#{dmnPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}||'%'
AND ASIS_DIT LIKE '%'||#{asisDit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}||'%'
AND ASIS_SYSTEM_NM LIKE '%'||#{asisSystemNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}||'%'
AND ASIS_GROUP_NM LIKE '%'||#{asisGroupNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}||'%'
AND ASIS_DB_NM LIKE '%'||#{asisDbNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}||'%'
AND ASIS_TBL_NM LIKE '%'||#{asisTblNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}||'%'
AND ASIS_COL_NM LIKE '%'||#{asisColNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}||'%'
AND CODE_NM LIKE '%'||#{codeNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}||'%'
AND DFD_COL_NM LIKE '%'||#{dfdColNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}||'%'
AND DFD_COL_VALUE LIKE '%'||#{dfdColValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}||'%'
AND CODE_VALUE LIKE '%'||#{codeValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}||'%'
AND CODE_DISP_NUM LIKE '%'||#{codeDispNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}||'%'
AND APP_TEAM_NM LIKE '%'||#{appTeamNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}||'%'
AND APP_CHRG_NM LIKE '%'||#{appChrgNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}||'%'
AND TSF_TEAM_NM LIKE '%'||#{tsfTeamNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}||'%'
AND TSF_CHRG_NM LIKE '%'||#{tsfChrgNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}||'%'
AND APP_SI_NM LIKE '%'||#{appSiNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}||'%'

SELECT A.* ,GET_USER_NM(A.FRS_RQST_USER_ID) AS FRS_RQST_USER_NM ,GET_USER_NM(A.RQST_USER_ID) AS RQST_USER_NM ,GET_USER_NM(A.APRV_USER_ID) AS APRV_USER_NM FROM WAM_ASIS_DMN_CD_VAL A
DMN_ID = #{dmnId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
